mods.abstract: Part six of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Tokyo, Japan at Budo Kahn Hall. Featuring Tex Ritter (host/performer), Brian Collins (performer), and Wanda Jackson (performer).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
